entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the son of Harry's Muggle relatives, who is bawling at his mother downstairs.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a wizard and the main character, who is currently staying with his Muggle relatives.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: Dudley's mother is mentioned as being downstairs, listening to Dudley's tantrum.

relationships.description: Dudley and Harry have a conflict because Dudley wants the room for himself and is angry that Harry is staying there.
Harry would rather be back in his cupboard with a letter than up here without it, indicating that he prefers the company of the letter over being with Dudley.
